remarks: Lemma for 3OA (weak) orthoarguesian law.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
3oalem1.1 $e |- B e. CH $.
3oalem1.2 $e |- C e. CH $.
3oalem1.3 $e |- R e. CH $.
3oalem1.4 $e |- S e. CH $.
3oalem2 $p |- ( ( ( ( x e. B /\ y e. R ) /\ v = ( x +h y ) ) /\ ( ( z e. C /\ w e. S ) /\ v = ( z +h w ) ) ) -> v e. ( B +H ( R i^i ( S +H ( ( B +H C ) i^i ( R +H S ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d B v w x y z $.
$d C v w x y z $.
$d R v w x y z $.
$d S v w x y z $.
